title: Getting wet
creator_credit: P.J. Hogan, Chris Fitchett and AFTRS
brief_description: Fifteen year old Alex and his older brother, Michael both like the same girl who has worked in their family pub for years. When she accompanies the family on a holiday to the beach, Alex hopes he can attract her attention, but as usual it is Michael who gets the girl, but there are compensations for Alex.
